     130                 :            : /**
     131                 :            :  * Class LivelinessQosPolicy, to indicate the Liveliness of the Writers.
     132                 :            :  * This QosPolicy can be defined for the Subscribers and is transmitted but only the Writer Liveliness protocol
     133                 :            :  * is implemented in this version. The user should set the lease_duration and the announcement_period with values that differ
     134                 :            :  * in at least 30%. Values too close to each other may cause the failure of the writer liveliness assertion in networks
     135                 :            :  * with high latency or with lots of communication errors.
     136                 :            :  * kind: Default value AUTOMATIC_LIVELINESS_QOS
     137                 :            :  * lease_duration: Default value c_TimeInfinite.
     138                 :            :  * announcement_period: Default value c_TimeInfinite (must be < lease_duration).
     139                 :            :  */
